-JpKAFQ2LBn5cF8cxcZ0.entry: A Penny Saved is a Penny Earned

-Jpstn8SkxGfiSjbrWaV.entry: I guess money can't buy happiness if you shop in the wrong places.

-Jpsi57ulCiK5c-p-fW0.entry: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough

-Jpsj6Ol0WNYmLgZGoRj.entry: But I can hardly sit still. I keep fidgeting, crossing one leg and then the other. I feel like I could throw off sparks, or break a window--maybe rearrange all the furniture.

-JpsjTjFvHtW7KUfO8ZP.entry: Don't you long for something different to happen, something so exciting and new it carries you along with it like a great tide, something that lets your life blaze and burn so the whole world can see it?

-JpsjjJPDviiGsBCDcz6.entry: Many people lose the small joys in the hope for the big happiness.

-Jpskcw2oQWm-hV9F5o1.entry: For just one second, look at your life and see how perfect it is. Stop looking for the next secret door that is going to lead you to your real life. Stop waiting. This is it: there's nothing else. It's here, and you'd better decide to enjoy it or you're going to be miserable wherever you go, for the rest of your life, forever.

-JpsxGOiL9PaGjlcumyL.entry: Is it weird that I'm an adult now?

0.entry: I'm not lazy. I'm just really gifted, only instead of being good at music or math I'm good at sleeping late.

-JpK7t2qm-19tRF_oHNe.entry: 3am. Sleep, those little slices of death — how I loathe them.

-Jps_N60QNnafvMH8SYz.entry: Around 11pm because I caught the flu and needed to recover.

-JpsprgspxdlOX4VAqJN.entry: I wonder why I don't go to bed and go to sleep. But then it would be tomorrow, so I decide that no matter how tired, no matter how incoherent I am, I can skip on hour more of sleep and live.

-JpsqskQ4-79ZNeb8a1k.entry: Am I sleeping? Have I slept at all? This is insomnia.

-JpsrDuS8AIBuPPqdir5.entry: I don't know if you've ever felt like that. That you wanted to sleep for a thousand years. Or just not exist. Or just not be aware that you do exist. Or something like that. I think wanting that is very morbid, but I want it when I get like this. That's why I'm trying not to think. I just want it all to stop spinning.

-JpsrcaAi3TzH9m6mNCg.entry: The night is the hardest time to be alive and 4am knows all my secrets.

-Jpss0Xuny0eZDBiI1wA.entry: I've always envied people who sleep easily. Their brains must be cleaner, the floorboards of the skull well swept, all the little monsters closed up in a steamer trunk at the foot of the bed.

0.entry: Absolutely not. Housework can kill you if done right.

0.entry: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.

1.entry: Why spend 2/7th of your life wasting your free time? After all, free time isn’t free. Free time is the most expensive time you have, because nobody pays for it but you. But that also makes it the most valuable time you have, as you alone stand to reap the profits from spending it wisely.

2.entry: There's never enough time to do all the nothing you want.

-JpK8nt0JZldyxdHKuBJ.entry: Those who make the worst use of their time are the first to complain of its brevity.

-JpmQe-Hf6vERkrZERwM.entry: Cook a good meal at home instead of eating out at unhealthy restaurants all the time.

-Jpso3gJKSl3NklYKmfx.entry: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.

-Jpso_PWGEPT-QNSLtPm.entry: Five minutes are enough to dream a whole life, that is how relative time is.
